main event: A civilian reported a possible UFO sighting resembling a meteor in December 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed flying to the West for 2-3 seconds., The sighting occurred around 2:30 am., Described as a reddish-orange color, possibly with white or ivory tones., The Air Force responded, indicating the sighting resembled meteor or satellite decay characteristics., The report mentions a foggy weather condition during the sighting.
sighted object: a possible reddish-orange object like a shooting star
witness description: Civilian, with a handwritten report of the sighting.
